txt.en:
'Welcome warrior. This is your opportunity to prove your prowess on the field of battle. If you choose to, you may speak with me again to enter mortal battle with an opponent of great power and strength.

'You will take on the role of a terrible troll, one of Angmar's most fearsome combatants. You will enter an arena within the Ettenmoors, the monster player area of Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar where you will test your mettle against a Ranger of Esteldín.

'Speak with me again to launch your troll session.'
'Ah, then you are prepared to take on the role of this dastardly beast. Very well.'
You have achieved a goal open to only a few. You will have the glory of representing Angmar in a battle to the death against a ranger of Esteldín.
Speak with the ranger to enter mortal battle as a troll
Speak again to the ranger within this room and choose to enter battle as a savage troll out of Angmar.
Speak with the ranger to complete the quest.
Speak with the ranger to complete the quest.
